MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Abbreviation; used adverbially or adjectivally to specify time.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Used to indicate the period of time extending from midnight to noon (the 12 hours before the sun crosses the meridian).
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 用于指示从午夜到正午的时间段（中午之前）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The meeting starts promptly at 8:00 A.M.
